title: flower12
author: flower12
content: Hello friends, I'm new here and I want to briefly tell you about my journey in getting to know cryptocurrency.I first became familiar with crypto because I was introduced to it by a friend of mine who was already involved in the world of cryptocurrency, and when I was told by him, to be honest, I wasn't too interested because I thought this was like a fraud scheme like I had experienced before, yes, several times I had to deceived because they entered a world that lured investment. However, I tried to find out through several platforms such as YouTube and others, after I watched it I thought this was different from the offers I had received so far. After searching for some time, I found several Telegram channels that discussed crypto and focused more on airdrop hunting.After finding out about crypto for a long time, I finally decided to get involved in it, and to be honest, it changed me in several ways, one of which was my habits in managing finances. If previously I only focused on saving fiat money, I slowly allocated it to buy some coins. Yes, even though the journey is not that smooth, sometimes I can make a profit and sometimes I also lose because I bought the wrong coin which in the end just becomes a decoration in my trust wallet (FYI, the trust wallet was the first wallet I used).I remember when I bought BNB at that time it gave me a profit even though I had to be patient to wait. Yes, it's not easy and sometimes I also doubt whether I should sell it back or hold it, and I was lucky at that time because I decided to continue holding it until it finally gave me a profit. The reason I can continue to hold it is because I work and have a steady income, and even when I have to lose I still have a stable income. From there I also learned that patience is one of the keys to gaining profits.I joined this forum because I was introduced to it by a friend and I also studied this forum for several weeks and finally I decided to join it. I see that I will gain a lot of new knowledge here, exchanging information and that can improve my literacy.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: flower12 on September 19, 2023, 04:53:59 PM<snip>Off to a good start, and a captivating story, I must say. There are a few important things you might want to learn as you continue your journey in the world of cryptocurrency. Firstly, understanding how to secure your wallet is crucial. Additionally, consider diversifying your crypto investments more effectively, and stay informed about trading regulations in your country of residence. Some exchanges that once didn't require KYC (Know Your Customer) verification may now do so due to increased government regulation. If you prefer to avoid this, there are decentralized exchanges, known as DEX (Decentralized Exchanges), where such verification is not mandatory.I see several qualities of a promising investor in from you. Keep up the learning, best of luck, and welcome to the forum!
